title: How has technology ruined your career? - Quora

response.answer_text: I remember one guy who had a very famous cassette and CD store when I was kid. He was like the market king and very rude to the customers because there was no alternative. With time, I have seen him going down because of the digitalization. With that being said, I would say that technology never ruin the career but the people who do not cope up with the new technology get outdated.
